headline: Zebra Technologies Tops Q4 Views, Gives Cautious 2025 Outlook
summary: Zebra Technologies beat Q4 expectations and guided higher than views for the current quarter. But Zebra stock fell on its cautious 2025 outlook.

headline: Zebra Stock Drops. Trade, Tariff, and Dollar Worries Overshadow Earnings.

headline: Zebra Technologies Q4 Earnings & Revenues Top Estimates, Rise Y/Y

headline: Zebra Technologies forecast misses on uncertainty in costs as tariff impact looms
summary: (Reuters) -Zebra Technologies on Thursday forecast 2025 profit below Wall Street estimates, becoming the latest company to highlight the impact of tariffs on its earnings.  A number of companies in the U.S. including Ford and Coca- Cola have pointed to disruptions and additional costs after U.S. President Donald Trump announced steep tariffs on certain imports from Canada, Mexico and China.  Zebra expects a full-year adjusted profit of $14.75-$15.25 per share, below analysts' estimate of $15.89 per share.

headline: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) Tops Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Zebra (ZBRA) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 1.27% and 1.81%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Zebra: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $3.95 per share. The producer of printers for bar codes, plastic cards and, radio-frequency identification tags posted revenue of $1.33 billion in the period, which also topped Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.31 billion.

headline: Zebra Technologies Announces Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Results
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., February 13, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, today announced results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2024.
